metadata.title: CVE-2017-12967 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The getsym function in tekhex.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a malformed tekhex binary.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.29-5ubuntu1').
